features: PURIFY AND CLEANSE the skin with this fermented gel cleanser to help balance the skin's microbiome. Formulated with a blend of fermented ingredients and gentle exfoliants, this cleanser will cleanse the skin from dirt and impurities while also providing necessary hydration. Skin is left refreshed, soft, and clean.

A COMPLEX OF FERMENTED INGREDIENTS like Fermented Pear, Soybean Ferment, Pomegranate Ferment, and Barley Seed Ferment. All together penetrate the skin with vitamins and antioxidants to improve skin appearance. Leaves skin hydrated for a smooth and soft feel.

A blend of exfoliants like CAPRYLOYL SALICYLIC ACID, PROTEASE, & WILLOW BARK EXTRACT to gently exfoliate dead skin for a smoother and brighter complexion. These exfoliants are gentle enough to be used everyday, by all skin types.

BENEFITS: PURIFYING, HYDRATING, & EXFOLIATING. This cleanser is great for all skin types and those looking to strengthen their skin barrier. It loads the skin with antioxidants to balance the microbiome. While providing gentle exfoliation, it also keeps skin hydrated so you're left with clean, smooth skin.
A CONTROLLED AMOUNT of product gets dispensed from our springless pump. It's recommended to pump 3 to 5 times for your desired amount.

reviews.reviewText: Makes my skin sooo soft. I use it like once or twice a week since its an exfoliant and my skin is verrrrrrry sens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magic in a bottle
reviews.reviewText: I don't know what sorcery this stuff is, but this face wash made my textured, bumpy skin disappear within five days of using. Plus, it smells amazing. 1000/10 would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for those with sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Lately, I’ve been learning more about fermented products in skincare and as I’ve tried them, I’ve found that they seem to work really well for my skin. I recently bought for myself FACETORY’s Urban Calm Soft Essence and loved it so much! It really helped my skin a lot and was an essence that didn’t feel too heavy or leave my sensitive, but breakout-prone, skin feeling greasy. As such, I was offered a chance to try their Gel Facial Cleanser! I can honestly say that I love this product even more than the essence! It cleanses my face without drying it or it has also gotten rid of the redness that I had been struggling with for a while. It won’t be for every one perhaps as it’s not a heavy foaming cleanser etc so maybe for those with really oily skin etc it wouldn’t be the best? I don’t know. I guess you would have to try it and and see, but maybe that’s just my misunderstanding that foaming products are better for oiky skin and it really is the products that are important. I just know that this works so well for my skin which is sensitive and does and have oily T-spot but tends to be dry overall. It also has redness which has been evened out so much with this product. It’s been great and I will keep on using it for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful gel cleanser, my favorite.
reviews.reviewText: If you haven't heard or tried this product yet, let me tell you. It is actually a brilliant gel cleanser. My poor face got a little sunburnt yesterday so I've been careful with applying makeup & skincare lightly. This cleanser felt so nice & refreshing on my face and helped calm it down alot. has no artificial colors, no parabens or sulfates. It does contain fermented pear and salicylic acids which has amazing benefits for your skin. The only con for me which is not a big deal, but I wish it foamed more. but this does a tremendous job on cleaning your skin without stripping it or feeling dried out after. So overall I'm pretty happy with it. I love the glass jar too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Instantly soft skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this cleanser! It instantly makes my skin soft, a noticeable difference just after one use. No side effects either, and I have very sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Smells good and not too strong. Got rid of some blackheads on my nose. I like the ingredients.
